channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There are a number of poorly repaired potholes in a group,and are now making people swerve to avoid this area on the road., 3rd November
item.description:
Halfway along Greenhills Road on the Nearside travelling towards Pilley Bridge roundabout.This area has had a number of separate potholes poorly repaired and are once again creating a possible danger to oncoming traffic,with cars trying to avoid them,as they come onto them.This has been a problem which should have been resolved when Greenhills Road was shut to enable repairs to be carried out.These pothole all remained there when the road was reopened.?? This part of the road need repairing as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Sandy Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This is the entrance way into Six Ways Clinic Car Park.This has been repeatedly repaired,and it is now in need of URGENT REPAIR,as tyres,wheels are likely to be damaged, 3rd November
item.description:
Entrance way from London Road into Six Ways Clinic.The holes are now becoming increasingly likely to damage vehicles wheels,and suspension. Repairs carried out repeatedly,have now failed once again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Barton Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: 2 vans illegally parked, 3rd November
item.description:
One van has been parked on signal yellow line for 3 weeks And the other is parked on double yellows opposite a junction making it difficult and dangerous for motorcyclists

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenwood Close, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
